summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Landing Page Editor backend integration. All API endpoints are working correctly, editor functionality is fully operational, and the public coach landing page displays saved settings properly. The integration between editor and public page is working as expected.

integration_issues.issue: Save Changes button works but no clear success toast/notification is displayed to user after saving

passed_tests: Backend API GET /landingpage/settings/:brandSlug returns correct settings for existing brands
Backend API GET /landingpage/settings/:brandSlug returns default settings for new brands
Backend API POST /landingpage/settings successfully saves landing page settings
Backend API save and retrieve cycle maintains data consistency across all key fields
Landing Page Editor loads correctly at /dashboard/landing after authentication
All 5 editor tabs (General, Hero Section, Content, Pricing, Reviews) are functional and clickable
General tab form fields (Brand Name, URL Slug, Theme Color, About Section) are editable
Hero Section tab form fields (Title, Description, Image URL) are editable
Content tab form fields (Section Title, Description, Image URL) are editable
Pricing tab form fields (Plan Name, Price, Benefits) are editable and benefit addition works
Reviews tab displays existing reviews and allows adding new reviews with rating system
Save Changes button is functional and triggers API call to save settings
Preview button opens public coach landing page in new tab
Public coach landing page at /coach/annamartin loads correctly with proper content
Public page displays hero section with correct title and description from API
Public page shows brand information (Anna Martin, fitness content) from saved settings
Public page displays pricing information (Â£29.99/month) from editor settings
Public page shows customer reviews (Sarah K., Mike T., Emma L.) from API data
Public page has functional call-to-action buttons (Join Now, Start Free Trial, Get Access Now)
Public page has proper layout structure with images and responsive design elements
Integration between Landing Page Editor and public coach page works correctly
Settings saved in editor are properly reflected on public landing page
Authentication flow works correctly for accessing dashboard and landing editor
action_item_for_main_agent: Consider adding a clear success toast/notification when Save Changes is clicked to provide better user feedback. Currently the save operation works but users don't get visual confirmation.
